title: Eventide: Slavic Fable CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Eventide: Slavic Fable CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Eventide: Slavic Fable is an exciting adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Set in a contemporary heritage park where mythical Slavic creatures co-exist with humans. When a famous botanist, receives an alarming invitation from her grandmother, the curator of mysterious Moorland, unbeknownst to her, she will embark on a quest through the ancient world filled with magic and folklore. Tasked with saving an endangered plant (which turns out to be the least of her concerns) she will need to rescue her Grandma from the clutches of the mysterious Boruta, who is plotting to conquer and destroy the world using the park's ancient magic.

============================================
CE FEATURES:                               =
============================================

The game contains 38 hand-painted locations, inspired by local flavor, 43 puzzles and original hidden object scenes, 25 achievements and an extra adventure that will lead the protagonist to the magical Midsummer Forest in search of the Fern Flower.

============================================
Instructions:                              =
============================================

* Install                                         ^_^
* Play
